00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SLIST_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SLIST_HPP
00003

00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif

00019 #include <cstddef> // size_t
00020 #include <boost/config.hpp> // msvc 6.0 needs this for warning suppression
00021 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00022 namespace std{ 
00023     using ::size_t; 
00024 } // namespace std
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 #ifdef BOOST_HAS_SLIST
00028 #include BOOST_SLIST_HEADER
00029 
00030 #include <boost/serialization/collections_save_imp.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/serialization/collections_load_imp.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/serialization/split_free.hpp>
00033 #include <boost/serialization/nvp.hpp>
00034 
00035 namespace boost { 
00036 namespace serialization {
00037 
00038 template<class Archive, class U, class Allocator>
00039 inline void save(
00040     Archive & ar,
00041     const BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::slist<U, Allocator> &t,
00042     const unsigned int file_version
00043 ){
00044     boost::serialization::stl::save_collection<
00045         Archive,
00046         BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::slist<U, Allocator> 
00047     >(ar, t);
00048 }
00049 
00050 template<class Archive, class U, class Allocator>
00051 inline void load(
00052     Archive & ar,
00053     BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::slist<U, Allocator> &t,
00054     const unsigned int file_version
00055 ){
00056     // retrieve number of elements
00057     t.clear();
00058     // retrieve number of elements
00059     collection_size_type count;
00060     ar >> BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(count);
00061     if(std::size_t(0) == count)
00062         return;
00063     unsigned int v;
00064     if(3 < ar.get_library_version()){
00065         ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("item_version", v);
00066     }
00067     boost::serialization::detail::stack_construct<Archive, U> u(ar, v);
00068     ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("item", u.reference());
00069     t.push_front(u.reference());
00070     BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::slist<U, Allocator>::iterator last;
00071     last = t.begin();
00072     std::size_t c = count;
00073     while(--c > 0){
00074         boost::serialization::detail::stack_construct<Archive, U> 
00075             u(ar, file_version);
00076         ar >> boost::serialization::make_nvp("item", u.reference());
00077         last = t.insert_after(last, u.reference());
00078         ar.reset_object_address(& (*last), & u.reference());
00079     }
00080 }
00081 
00082 // split non-intrusive serialization function member into separate
00083 // non intrusive save/load member functions
00084 template<class Archive, class U, class Allocator>
00085 inline void serialize(
00086     Archive & ar,
00087     BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::slist<U, Allocator> &t,
00088     const unsigned int file_version
00089 ){
00090     boost::serialization::split_free(ar, t, file_version);
00091 }
00092 
00093 } // serialization
00094 } // namespace boost
00095 
00096 #include <boost/serialization/collection_traits.hpp>
00097 
00098 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS(BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::slist)
00099 
00100 #endif  // BOOST_HAS_SLIST
00101 #endif  // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SLIST_HPP
